ANIPLUS x hololive production Collaboration Cafe Opens in Korea From May 1st, 2025 | NEWS - ホロライブ公式サイト
ANIPLUS x hololive production Collaboration Cafe Opens in Korea From May 1st, 2025
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive production x ANIPLUS collaboration cafe will be opened in Korea for a limited period starting from May 1st, 2025.

The collaboration café theme was previously held in the ANIPLUS café in Singapore and will be revived in the ANIPLUS café in Korea. The collaboration cafe will feature a collaboration menu featuring Shirakami Fubuki, Ookami Mio, Nekomata Okayu, and Inugami Korone from hololive’s unit “hololive GAMERS” and the members of hololive 3rd generation, Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine. Attendees who order the collaboration menu will receive exclusive items.

In addition, hololive production x ANIPLUS collaboration café collaboration merch will be released.

ANIPLUS x hololive production Café

May 1st – June 29th

B101, Mapo Hangang PRUGIO 2nd apt. Arcade, 14 World Cup-ro 3-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

May 1st – June 29th

9F, 672, Jungang-daero, Busanjin-gu, Busan, Republic of Korea

May 1st – May 28th

401~403, Cheongjeong-Building, 126, Jungang-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon, Republic of Korea

May 1st – June 29th

12, Chungjangnoan-gil, Dong-gu, Gwangju, Republic of Korea

ANIPLUS x hololive production Café Menu

Limited Bonus for the 1st to 4th Week: Coaster & Mini holder (Random) *Limited bonus for the 5th week and onwards will be announced at a later date.

ANIPLUS x hololive production Café Merch

hololive production x ANIPLUS Café Merch Bonus With 20,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Sticker (random)

With 50,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Hologram Ticket (random)

With 70,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Transparent fan (random)

*Designs distributed randomly. *All premiums are available while stocks last only.

COVER Corporation Announces hololive Meet 2025 Ambassadors
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation announced today the five new Ambassadors for hololive Meet 2025.

Momosuzu Nene (hololive), Vestia Zeta (hololive Indonesia), Koseki Bijou (hololive English), Otonose Kanade (hololive DEV_IS), Aragami Oga (HOLOSTARS), and Octavio (HOLOSTARS English) have been appointed as hololive Meet 2025 Ambassadors, where they will be actively promoting ongoing and upcoming hololive Meet projects. There will be release of new merchandise featuring the newly appointed Ambassadors at a future date!

Comments from hololive Meet 2025 Ambassadors

“KonNene! hololive 5th generation! The “N” in NePoLaBo, the energy drink for everyone’s hearts! I’m Momosuzu Nene!

Is everyone doing well?! Thank you always for your support!💛 Thanks to everyone, I was chosen as an ambassador for 2025!✨ It’s all thanks to the passionate support from my overseas husbands! Let’s go and see more and more different sceneries from here on out! Nene is going to do her best to make all the Nekkos around the world happy!”

Vestia Zeta (hololive Indonesia) “Aaa mission stato! Halooo, I’m Vestia Zeta from hololive Indonesia gen 3!

I just got a new mission to become the Hololive Meet Ambassador 2025!

Super excited to create amazing memories with you all! We do a little meeting!

SEE YOUUU! Yoroshiku ne!”

Koseki Bijou (hololive English) “KIRA KIRA~ KOSEKI!!!

I’m Koseki Bijou (BIBOO!) and TODAYYYYY I’m happy to say that I’m an ambassador this year for hololive Meet 2025!!

HELLO EVERYONE FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD!!! I’m so grateful for this opportunity and I can’t wait to meet you! Get ready cuz I’m taking my Biboo love to you!!

IT’S TIME TO ROCK THE BEEP IN! :D!”

Otonose Kanade (hololive DEV_IS) “Do-Re-Mi-Fa-So-La-Si-Do! I am Otonose Kanade, an aspiring musician from hololive DEV_IS ReGLOSS!

Woo! I’m an ambassador for hololive Meet 2025!

Thank you to everyone around the world for supporting hololive!✨

I’ll do my best to make lots of fun memories!

Spread your wings and fly out into the world, hololive!”

“Hey, how are you doing?

I’m Aragami Oga from HOLOSTARS!

Thanks to all of you from all over the world for your support!

Now that I’ve been chosen as an ambassador for hololive Meet 2025, I’ll do my best to make all the fans around the world happy so yoroshiku!”

Octavio (HOLOSTARS ENGLISH) “It is I! The one whose name starts with an O and ends with an O, my name is Octavio from Holostars English! It is my pleasure to show you around all of our Holomeet events this year. Just make sure you step out of the way when I ambassador here, and ambassador there and ambassador all over the place though! I’m looking forward to you meeting me as well! Time for me to ambassador out of here! See you when I see you!”

items.author: Horii
items.content:
Kaela Kovalskia from hololive Indonesia will reveal her new visual on her YouTube channel on March 26th, 2025 (JST).

[Kaela Kovalskia’s New Design Reveal Livestream]

We hope you take the opportunity to watch a powered-up Kaela Kovalskia with her new visual.

Click here for Kaela Kovalskia’s Talent Page.

items.title: Octopus x hololive Gen 0 Virtual Cards are Available from March 14th - カバー株式会社
Octopus x hololive Gen 0 Virtual Cards are Available from March 14th - ホロライブ公式サイト
Octopus x hololive Gen 0 Virtual Cards are Available from March 14th
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation has announced a new collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, introducing exclusive virtual card images featuring hololive Gen 0 talents. These special edition Octopus Card images are available for purchase through the “Octopus Card Image Store”.

As one of the most widely used smart payment systems in Hong Kong, Octopus Card will release a set of five unique virtual card images featuring Tokino Sora, Roboco-san, AZKi, Sakura Miko, and Hoshimachi Suisei. Each design features the talents in traditional Hong Kong style outfits, enjoying iconic local street food and embracing the city’s vibrant culture.

The hololive Gen 0 virtual card images will be available exclusively on the “Octopus Card Image Store” starting from March 14th, 2025 at HK$38 each.

During the sales period, all fans who purchase the card will automatically qualify for a giveaway event. Stay tuned to Octopus’ official social media channels for details on entry requirements and giveaway announcements.

For more information, please visit the official Octopus social media accounts.

Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

items.title: hololive performs at the Final Act of “ENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025” at the Osaka-Kansai Expo! | NEWS | hololive official website - ホロライブ公式サイト
hololive performs at the Final Act of “ENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025” at the Osaka-Kansai Expo!
items.author: maki
items.content:
COVER Corp., the company behind the VTuber agency “hololive production,” is pleased to announce that hololive will perform at “ENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025,” held at the Osaka-Kansai Expo on April 26th (Sat) and 27th (Sun), 2025.

Confirmed as the Final Act for “ENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025”!

Talents from hololive, hololive Indonesia, and hololive English will come together for a special showcase during the “2nd part” on April 27th at the EXPO Arena of the Osaka-Kansai Expo. This will be a one-night-only performance that you won’t want to miss! To attend, advance reservations are required through the official Osaka-Kansai Expo website. The “2nd part” performance will be available through a lottery system, and applications must be submitted via the Expo’s official website up to 8 days before the event.

Don’t miss this special opportunity! We look forward to your applications.

Hoshimachi Suisei, Sakura Miko, Nakiri Ayame, Oozora Subaru, Usada Pekora, Shirogane Noel, Houshou Marine, Amane Kanata, Tsunomaki Watame, Kobo Kanaeru, Mori Calliope, Shiori Novella, Koseki Bijou, Nerissa Ravencroft, Fuwawa Abyssgard, Mococo Abyssgard.

Note: Performers are subject to change without notice.

Japan Expo Paris in Osaka Information

Mori Calliope 2nd Solo Concert “Grimoire”
items.author: ashikawahazuki
items.content:
Mori Calliope 2nd Solo Concert “Grimoire”

COVER Corporation / hololive production / hololive English

February 26th, 2025 / Doors Open: 5:30 PM / Streaming starts: 6:30 PM / Starts: 7:00 PM (PST)

[Sales Period] 6 PM, December 14th, 2024 (PST) 〜 Start of the event

Additional Sales Ticket : 6 PM, February 5th, 2025 (PST) 〜 Start of the event

* Please note that sales will end when the planned number of venue tickets have been sold. * Venue tickets are not drawn by lottery unlike with many Japanese concerts, and will be on a first-come, first-served basis.

* Payment for the ticket system fee is required separately from the ticket price. Please check the details on the purchase page.

* General Admission area will be all-standing.

* Balcony area will be all-seated.

* For Early Entry GA Ticket and Balcony Table Ticket (4seats), you will be able to entry from 5:30 PM.

* For GA Ticket, you will be able to entry from 6:00 PM.

* For Early Entry GA Ticket, please entry before 6:00 PM, after 6:00 PM you will be entering with other GA ticket holders.

* Balcony Table Ticket (4seats) will be including 4 seats in 1 purchase.

* For Balcony Table Ticket (4seats), 4 tickets will be distributed separately.

* GA Tickets are still on sale.

November 22nd, 2024 8:00 PM ~ March 26th, 2025 8:00 PM (PST)*Please be aware that after March 26th, 2025 10:59 PM (PST), you will not be able to watch the archived stream.

8:30PM February 20th, 2025 (PST) – 2AM March 24th, 2025 (PDT)
